description: The Asociaci칩n de Agricultura Biodin치mica (ABD) in Colombia promotes sustainable farming practices based on biodynamic principles. Founded in 2019, the association supports farmers through training, participatory guarantee systems, and consultancy services. It aims to enhance agricultural sustainability by treating the land as a living organism, fostering biodiversity, and creating marketing channels for biodynamic products. ABD also collaborates with local communities to share knowledge and promote ecological farming practices.
